author: AETerry
title: Perry and Chester
review:
This is one of the many Fabuland sets that mainly featured a minifigure and some accessories.

 

In the case of this set, you get two minifigures, a little motorcycle, ladder and broom. And for the age group of children that this is intended for, the minifigures and accessories are usually just what they want to play with.

 

It's not a bad little set and I remember many hours of play with this and other Fabuland sets.
